statements: SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, blood_type, health_issues FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE child_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE guardian_name LIKE 'John Doe%';
SELECT child_id, full_name, guardian_name FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE date_of_birth < '2015-01-01';
SELECT full_name, blood_type, last_checkup_date FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE health_issues IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords ORDER BY last_checkup_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, guardian_name FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE health_issues IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE blood_type = 'O-positive' ORDER BY full_name ASC, last_checkup_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT child_id, full_name, guardian_name FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE last_checkup_date >= '2021-01-01' AND last_checkup_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY child_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, guardian_name, blood_type FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE health_issues LIKE '%allergy%' ORDER BY guardian_name ASC, full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE blood_type IN ('A-positive', 'B-positive') ORDER BY last_checkup_date DESC, child_id ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM child_medical_records WHERE child_name = 'Alice';
SELECT child_name, birth_date, height FROM child_medical_records ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT child_name, weight FROM child_medical_records WHERE height > 120;
SELECT * FROM custody_proceedings WHERE judge_name = 'Smith' AND outcome = 'Granted';
SELECT child_name, birth_date, court_date, outcome FROM child_medical_records INNER JOIN custody_proceedings ON child_medical_records.id = custody_proceedings.child_id;
SELECT * FROM child_medical_records WHERE birth_date = '2020-01-01';
SELECT child_name, height, weight FROM child_medical_records WHERE child_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT child_name, record_date FROM child_medical_records WHERE height > 120 AND weight < 40;
SELECT * FROM custody_proceedings WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT case_number, court_date, outcome FROM custody_proceedings ORDER BY court_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords;
SELECT id, child_name, date_of_birth FROM ChildHealthRecords ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT child_name, blood_type, weight FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE weight > 20 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT id, child_name, height FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE date_of_birth < '2010-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalExams WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY exam_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChildHealthRecords ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT child_name, blood_type, weight FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC;

SELECT c.child_name, m.diagnosis, cp.custody_status FROM ChildHealthRecords c INNER JOIN MedicalExams m ON c.id = m.child_id INNER JOIN CustodyProceedings cp ON c.id = cp.child_id WHERE m.exam_date > '2021-01-01' AND cp.court_date > m.exam_date ORDER BY c.child_name;
SELECT MAX(weight) AS max_weight, MIN(height) AS min_height FROM ChildHealthRecords;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM ChildHealthRecords WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT * FROM child;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM child;
SELECT id, diagnosis FROM medical_history ORDER BY doctor_visit_date DESC;
SELECT parent_id, hearing_date FROM custody_proceedings ORDER BY hearing_date ASC;
SELECT child.id, child.name, parent.name AS parent_name, parent.address FROM child JOIN parent ON child.id = parent.id;
SELECT * FROM child WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM child WHERE blood_type = 'O';
SELECT parent.name, parent.phone_number, custody_proceedings.case_number FROM parent INNER JOIN custody_proceedings ON parent.id = custody_proceedings.parent_id;

SELECT child.name, medical_history.diagnosis, custody_proceedings.hearing_date FROM child LEFT JOIN medical_history ON child.id = medical_history.child_id LEFT JOIN custody_proceedings ON child.id = custody_proceedings.child_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_children FROM child;
SELECT * FROM child_personal_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM child_personal_info WHERE date_of_birth < '2010-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, date_of_visit FROM child_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT parent_id, COUNT(*) FROM child_personal_info GROUP BY parent_id;
SELECT court_location, case_outcome FROM custody_proceedings WHERE case_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM child_personal_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM child_personal_info WHERE parent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, date_of_visit FROM child_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT child_id, court_location, case_outcome, lawyer_name FROM custody_proceedings WHERE case_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_id, case_id, commenter_name, comment_date FROM custody_comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe' AND comment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
